tool_description: Generates comprehensive daily ephemeris data showing positions of all major celestial bodies for a specified date range and location.

latitude.description: Observer latitude in decimal degrees (-90 to 90)

longitude.description: Observer longitude in decimal degrees (-180 to 180)

celestial_bodies.description: List of celestial bodies to include

include_aspects.description: Whether to include daily aspect information

data_precision.description: Precision level: standard, high, or ultra

error_messages: Invalid date range: End date must be after start date and range cannot exceed 1 year
Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be -90 to 90, longitude must be -180 to 180
Invalid timezone: Provide a valid timezone identifier
Invalid celestial bodies: Use standard names (Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto)
Invalid coordinate system: Use geocentric or topocentric
Invalid precision level: Use standard, high, or ultra
Invalid output format: Use decimal_degrees or degrees_minutes
usage: Provide date range and observer location. Optionally configure celestial bodies, coordinate system, precision, and output format. Returns comprehensive daily ephemeris data.

dates.description: Array of dates in ISO format

moon_phases.description: Array of moon phase names for each date
